title: My Friend Flicka
creator_credit: Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation, Ralph Dietrich and Harold Schuster
brief_description: A young boy is determined to befriend a rebellious horse in this touching family film based on the celebrated novel by Mary O’Hara. Setting his heart on winning Flicka’s confidence and ultimately taming her, Ken begins to grow up a little and everyone learns some important lessons in this poignant tale of love, patience, faith and ‘hope beyond hope’. Stars Roddy McDowall and Preston Foster.
